channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Edge, ChakraCore
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Edge, ChakraCore

item.title: CVE-2018-0837|2024-09-17T01:45:47.575Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20edge%2C%20chakracore
item.description: Microsoft Edge and ChakraCore in Microsoft Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, 1703, 1709, and Windows Server 2016 allows remote code execution, due to how the scripting engine handles objects in memory, aka "Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability". This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-0834, CVE-2018-0835, CVE-2018-0836, CVE-2018-0838, CVE-2018-0840, CVE-2018-0856, CVE-2018-0857, CVE-2018-0858, CVE-2018-0859, CVE-2018-0860, CVE-2018-0861, and CVE-2018-0866.
